content: toe or approx 2 inches less than desired length of sock toe round 1 sole k 1 ssk k to last 3 sts on needle k 2 decrease k1 repeat for instep needle round 2 k all sts repeat these 2 rounds until 32 sts remain 16 on each needle then repeat round 1 only until 16 sts remain 8 on each needle cut yarn leaving a 12 tail graft toe using kitchener stitch herringbone pattern <<<<<<<<<<<for first sock <<<<<<<<<<<<<< round 1 * k3 p1 * repeat to end of round round 2 k2 p1 * k3 p1 repeat from * to last stitch k1 round 3 k1 p1 * k3 p1 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 round 4 * p1 k3 * repeat to end of round rnds 5 thru 8 repeat rnds 1-4 round 9 - k1 p1 * k3 p1 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 round 10 k2 p1 * k3 p1 repeat from * to last stitch k1 round 11 * k3 p1 * repeat to end of round round 12 - * p1 k3 * repeat to end of round round 13 thru 15 repeat rnds 9-11 only >>>>>>>>>>>for second sock >>>>>>>>>>>> round 1 - k1 p1 * k3 p1 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 round 2 k2 p1 * k3 p1 repeat from * to last stitch k1 round 3 * k3 p1 * repeat to end of round round 4 - * p1 k3 * repeat to end of round round 5 thru 8 repeat rnds 1-4 round 9 * k3 p1 * repeat to end of round round 10 k2 p1 * k3 p1 repeat from * to last stitch k1 round 11 k1 p1 * k3 p1 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 round 12 * p1 k3 * repeat to end of round rnds 13 thru 15 repeat rnds 9-11 only © 2011 tempe croke this pattern is for personal use only
